article.title: BUILD EINS #SP001
article.subtitle: A Hand-Built Gravel Bicycle Frame
article.paragraph:
This custom gravel steel frame was designed with one clear purpose: comfort without compromise, whether the ride lasts an afternoon or stretches into weeks of travel.
Built from carefully selected steel tubing, the frame balances resilience and ride feel in a way few materials can. Steel’s natural compliance smooths rough gravel, broken pavement, and endless washboard roads, reducing fatigue while maintaining a lively, responsive character. Every tube is chosen and shaped to suit the rider’s proportions, riding style, and intended terrain—no generic geometry, no unnecessary stiffness.

The geometry prioritizes long-distance comfort and stability. A slightly taller stack and relaxed reach encourage an upright, sustainable position for day-long rides. The wheelbase is tuned for confident handling when loaded, offering stability with panniers or bikepacking bags while remaining agile on loose gravel and winding backroads. Generous tire clearance allows for wide tires, adding grip and vibration damping on unpredictable surfaces.
